name: Duplicati
short_description: Free backup software for encrypted, incremental backups.
description: Free backup software for encrypted, incremental backups. Duplicati is a self-hosted application focused on tools, security, utility, backup. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Duplicati on your home server to free backup software for encrypted, incremental backups without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Duplicati to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
